metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23221 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: H2 Console before 2.1.210 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary codevia a jdbc:h2:mem JDBC URL containing theIGNORE_UNKNOWN_SETTINGS=TRUE;FORBID_CREATION=FALSE;INIT=RUNSCRIPTsubstring, a different vulnerability than CVE-2021-42392.

criterions.comment: h2database: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
